system.effect: With a nasty crunch, the leg is broken and the target is left mewling in pain. He is Stunned for 2 round and falls Prone. The leg is Useless until the target receives medical attention.

description.value:
Impact Damage to Leg (Severity 7)

With a nasty crunch, the leg is broken and the target is left mewling in pain. He is Stunned for 2 round and falls Prone. The leg is Useless until the target receives medical attention.
